name: monero-bridge-circuit
description: Monero to Arbitrum Bridge ZK Circuit - Cryptographic proof of Monero transaction authenticity

scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/monero_bridge_v54.r1cs pot22_final.ptau build/monero_bridge_v54_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute: snarkjs zkey contribute build/monero_bridge_v54_0000.zkey build/monero_bridge_v54_final.zkey --name="First contribution"
scripts.export-vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/monero_bridge_v54_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.export-solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/monero_bridge_v54_final.zkey contracts/BridgeVerifier.sol

author: FUNGERBIL Team
